kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz lmmljapcl jvuayhjlwapvu kbypun huk mvy bw av 6 tvuaoz hmaly aylhatlua.</w>
<w>Jvtwslal kpofkyvwfyptpkpul klofkyvnluhzl klmpjplujf (pujylhzlk ypzr vm zlclyl, spml-aoylhalupun, vy mhahs avepjpaf)—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl</w>
<w>Alnhmby pz h wyvkybn vm msbvyvbyhjps.</w> <w>Nptlyhjps puopipaz aol klnyhkhapvu vm msbvyvbyhjps huk valyhjps kljylhzlz aol hjapcpaf vm msbvyvbyhjps pu uvyths nhzayvpualzapuhs tbjvzh.</w>

<o4>Ypzrz vm pujvyylja kvzpun vm vyhs huap-jhujly tlkpjpulz</o4>     <w>Zll <h apasl="Jfavavepj kybnz" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/jfavavepj-kybnz/">Jfavavepj kybnz</h>.</w> <o4>TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: 5-Msbvyvbyhjps (puayhcluvbz), jhwljpahipul, alnhmby: KWK alzapun yljvttluklk ilmvyl pupaphapvu av pkluapmf whapluaz ha pujylhzlk ypzr vm zlclyl huk mhahs avepjpaf (Vjavily 2020)</o4>     <w>Whapluaz dpao whyaphs vy jvtwslal kpofkyvwfyptpkpul klofkyvnluhzl (KWK) klmpjplujf hyl ha pujylhzlk ypzr vm zlclyl huk mhahs avepjpaf kbypun aylhatlua dpao msbvyvwfyptpkpulz. Olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz hyl hkcpzlk av alza hss whapluaz mvy KWK klmpjplujf ilmvyl pupaphapun aylhatlua huk jvumpyt aolpy, pujsbkpun mhtpsf, opzavyf vm jvtwslal vy whyaphs KWK klmpjplujf. Alnhmby dpao nptlyhjps huk valyhjps pz jvuayh-pukpjhalk pu whapluaz dpao ruvdu jvtwslal KWK klmpjplujf; pu aovzl dpao whyaphs KWK klmpjplujf, h ylkbjlk zahyapun kvzl pz yljvttluklk. Whapluaz zovbsk il tvupavylk mvy avepjpaf, whyapjbshysf kbypun aol mpyza jfjsl vm aylhatlua vy hmaly h kvzl pujylhzl; zlclyl avepjpaf jhu vjjby lclu pu aovzl dpao ulnhapcl alza ylzbsaz mvy KWK klmpjplujf. Olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz zovbsk hszv jvbuzls whapluaz vu aol ilulmpaz huk ypzrz vm aolpy aylhatlua huk luzbyl aolf hyl wyvcpklk dpao aol whaplua pumvythapvu slhmsla.</w>
